questions: Can you elaborate on your experience in Software Development over the past 8 years?
What motivated you to take a professional gap for personal development, and how has it contributed to your skillset?
How proficient are you in using React, .NET, and Spring Boot? Can you provide examples of projects where you have utilized these skills?
What specific achievements or projects are you most proud of from your previous work experience?
How do you stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in the field of software development?
Can you discuss a challenging problem you encountered during your career and how you successfully resolved it?
How do you approach collaborating with team members on software development projects?
Can you provide an example of a time when you had to quickly learn a new technology or programming language for a project?
How do you prioritize and manage your tasks to ensure timely delivery of projects?
In what ways do you see yourself contributing to a software development team in the future, considering your experience and skills?
